title.value: Influence of liquid complex mineral fertilizers on tomato fruit yielding and quality during cultivation in protected ground
Влияние жидких комплексных минеральных удобрений на урожайность и качество плодов томата при выращивании в защищенном грунте

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Matyuk, T.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented research into influence of dose and liquid complex fertilizers, including macro-and micronutrients in growing culture of tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) in unheated film greenhouses on growth and development of plants, yield and biochemical composition of fruits. The object of investigation was an indeterminate tomato variety Vezha of the national selection included into the 'State Register and varieties of trees and shrubs of the Republic of Belarus'. Research results showed that the cultivation of tomatoes in greenhouses with realization of three top dressings with the fertilizer Multivit Plus in dose 2,1-3,3 liter / ha and HCS for tomatoes and cucumbers in a dose of 2,4-3,7 liter / ha in phases plant growth and development provides yield at 2.0-2.3 kg/m2 or 20,4-23,5% and improves biochemical indicators of quality products.
